H0.text: In 1703, Isaac Newton succeeded which of his rivals as President of the Royal Society . Edmond Halley

H1.text: In 1703, Isaac Newton succeeded which of his rivals as President of the Royal Society . John Flamsteed

H2.text: In 1703, Isaac Newton succeeded which of his rivals as President of the Royal Society . Christiaan Huygens

H3.text: In 1703, Isaac Newton succeeded which of his rivals as President of the Royal Society . Robert Hook
